home.about: Computer Science Engineer with over ten years of experience creating innovative digital solutions. My approach combines the logic of code with a human perspective, always seeking to improve user experience and product quality. I believe the best technology emerges from collaborative work, honest communication, and a constant desire to learn and improve.
home.disclaimer: This presentation will surely change at some point...
